input: goal: To cut hexagon pieces for decoration. [SEP] solution 1This can be achieved by drawing hexagon pieces for each piece. [SEP] solution 2You can use this by using an already cut Fiskars die cutter.

goal: Preparing a Banana Milkshake Hair Mask [SEP] solution 1Mash or puree 1 to 2 bananas. Stream in the milk. Apply the mask to dry hair from the roots down.Cover your hair and let the mask sit for 20 minutes. Wash and condition your hair as normal. [SEP] solution 2Mash or puree 1 to 2 bananas. Stream in the chocolate milkshake. Apply the mask to dry hair from the roots down.Cover your hair and let the mask sit for 20 minutes. Wash and condition your hair as normal.

goal: How do you crumble Feta cheese? [SEP] solution 1Hold a chunk in your hand, then rub it back and forth with your finger tips, making bits crumble off. [SEP] solution 2Hold a chunk in your hand, then rub it back and forth with your finger tips, making bits stick together.
goal: To free yourself from a riptide, [SEP] solution 1swim directly towards the shore. [SEP] solution 2swim parallel to the shore.

goal: When stamping cookies with a pattern, do you cut or stamp first? [SEP] solution 1Always cut and then stamp, so you can ensure that the stamp fits onto the cookie. [SEP] solution 2Always stamp and then cut, as stamping will change the size and thickness of the cookie.
goal: how do you hold your breath? [SEP] solution 1take a deep breath in, and don't let it out. [SEP] solution 2take a deep breath in and let it out after five minutes.

goal: how to make waterproof matches [SEP] solution 1Pour 2 to 3 large tablespoons of turpentine into a small  glass.Place the matches, (head down) into the turpentine and allow the matches to soak for 5 minutes.     Remove the matches and spread them out to dry out on a sheet of newspaper. [SEP] solution 2Pour 2 to 3 large tablespoons of turpentine into a small  glass.Place the matches, (head down) into the turpentine and allow the matches to lay in charcoal for 5 minutes.     Remove the matches and spread them out to dry out on a sheet of newspaper.

goal: To keep pizza crust from getting chewy in the microwave. [SEP] solution 1Put a small amount of water in a glass in the microwave next to the pizza. [SEP] solution 2Put a small amount of water in a glass in the microwave on top off the pizza.

goal: How do I cool chocolate bread before serving? [SEP] solution 1Let the bread cool in the saw for 15 minutes then remove it and put on a wire rack to cool completely. [SEP] solution 2Let the bread cool in the pan for 15 minutes then remove it and put on a wire rack to cool completely.

goal: How do I prepare the ramekins when making vanilla souffles? [SEP] solution 1Butter the inside of 6 ramekins and use 1/4 cup of sugar to coat the inside of each one, making sure to cover all the exterior surface [SEP] solution 2Butter the inside of 6 ramekins and use 1/4 cup of sugar to coat the inside of each one, making sure to cover all the interior surface
goal: Hang mugs from a pole. [SEP] solution 1Use S hooks to hang mugs from a pole. [SEP] solution 2Use O hooks to hang mugs from a pole.
goal: projector [SEP] solution 1show future events [SEP] solution 2show historic events
goal: hoe [SEP] solution 1can burn  handkerchief  [SEP] solution 2can hit an  handkerchief

goal: How to make the roof of you birdhouse? [SEP] solution 1Glue about 20 chopsticks together in a circle. The attach four perpendicular chopsticks across to provide support. Repeat for the other side. [SEP] solution 2Glue about 20 chopsticks together in a line. The attach four perpendicular chopsticks across to provide support. Repeat for the other side.

goal: To stamp patterns in cookie dough. [SEP] solution 1After he dough is rolled out, use a stamp, stamp the pattern over the dough then cut out each one using the 6 cm cookie cutter. [SEP] solution 2After he dough is rolled out, use a stamp, stamp the pattern over the dough then cut out each one using the 6 cm cookie mold.

goal: Wash the fabric before creating a costume. [SEP] solution 1Put fabric in machine, wash, dry, and remove from dryer for use in your costume project in the next few days. [SEP] solution 2Add fabric to washing machine with one half cup of laundry detergent, wash on gentle cycle, a place in dryer.
